name: ResoluteIdea
0:
”Alexa, ask Resolute Idea for a New Years resolution”
”Alexa, ask Resolute Idea for a Idea”
”Next Idea”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: resolute idea
des:
Sometimes we need fresh and new ideas. Resolute idea wants to give you some fresh ideas for setting goals. From short-term to long-term goals and New Years Resolutions, I want to inspire people to do fun and meaningful things. 

1. Add the "Resolute Idea" Skill on your Alexa App
2. Enable the "Resolute Idea Skill" on your Alexa App
3. Say "Alexa, ask Resolute Idea for a New Year's resolution?"

4. If you like the idea, say "Exit"
5. If you don't like the idea, say "Next"


For new features or improvements, please ask me on Twitter at https://twitter.com/CraigMerry - I'm very responsive to new ideas and feature requests :)
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
